item.title: balgavy.com 19
item.itunes:author: Marc Balgavy
item.description: at cringe i read a letter never sent about my first kiss. and i try to con listeners into calling the audio comment line. (Running Time 11:20)

item.title: balgavy.com 18
item.itunes:author: Marc Balgavy
item.description: Listen for more than just the audio comments. I find myself on a strange tangent talking about a personal health issue. And it is not what you think. (Running Time 14:53)

item.title: balgavy.com podcast 15
item.itunes:author: Marc Balgavy
item.description: Your Razor or Mine? a documentary treatment i wrote in the fall of 1994. any producers interested in buying the idea from me? i'll sell it cheap! (Running Time 07:50)

item.title: Balgavy.com Podcast 14
item.itunes:author: Marc Balgavy
item.description: Letters galore from the early 90s. Bob Iger, were you listening? Cringe night plus BONUS material. (Running Time 11:40)

item.title: balgavy.com podcast 13
item.itunes:author: Marc Balgavy
item.description: The conclusion of the 2005 West Coast baseball trip is full boar craziness. An interview with Dancin Alex, in bar reports with Marc doing voices and a cacophony of sound in Long Beach. (Running Time 21:39)
